verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> you be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you,

And will <S%H6213>make<s%> an offering by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H6381>performing<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offering, <S%H176>or<s%> in your <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> of the herd <S%H1241><s%><S%H176>or<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock:<s%>

Then shall he that <S%H7126>offers<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7126>bring<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering shall you <S%H6213>prepare<s%> with the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And for a <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H176>or<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H6381>performing<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

Then shall he <S%H7126>bring<s%> with a <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H1241><s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H2677>half<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> for a <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering <S%H2677>half<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> for an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3602>Thus<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> or for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5795>kid.<s%>
According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>prepare,<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> to every <S%H259>one<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> that are <S%H249>born<s%> of the <S%H249>country<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things <S%H3602>after<s%> this <S%H3541>manner,<s%> in <S%H7126>offering<s%> an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with you, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H834>whoever<s%> be <S%H8432>among<s%> you in your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and will <S%H6213>offer<s%> an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as you <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> shall be both for you of the <S%H6951>congregation,<s%> and also for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> with you, an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations:<s%> as you are, so shall the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> be <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> shall be for you, and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> with you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, When you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> you,

Then it shall be, that, when you <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up a <S%H2471>cake<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> for an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering:<s%> as you do the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you <S%H7311>heave<s%> it.
Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> you have <S%H7683>erred,<s%> and not <S%H6213>observed<s%> all <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

Even <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> Moses, and <S%H1973>henceforward<s%> among your <S%H1755>generations;<s%>

Then it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> ought be <S%H6213>committed<s%> by <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> without the <S%H5869>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and his <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering, according to the <S%H4941>manner,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> them; for it is <S%H7684>ignorance:<s%> and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for their <S%H7684>ignorance:<s%>

And it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; <S%H3588>seeing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> were in <S%H7684>ignorance.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> a she <S%H5795>goat<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H7683>sins<s%> <S%H7683>ignorantly,<s%> when he <S%H2398>sins<s%> by <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him; and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for him that <S%H6213>sins<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> both for him that is <S%H249>born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H6213>does<s%> ought <S%H3027>presumptuously,<s%> <S%H4480>whether<s%> he be <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H249>land,<s%> or a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H1442>reproaches<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> he has <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and has <S%H6565>broken<s%> his <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall utterly be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off; his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall be on him.

And while the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7197>gathered<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And they that <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> him to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
And they <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>ward,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it was not <S%H6567>declared<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> should be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the congregation shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>bid<s%> them that they <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H6734>fringes<s%> in the <S%H3671>borders<s%> of their <S%H899>garments<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and that they <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H6734>fringe<s%> of the <S%H3671>borders<s%> a <S%H6616>ribbon<s%> of <S%H8504>blue:<s%>

And it shall be to you for a <S%H6734>fringe,<s%> that you may <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, and <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; and that you <S%H8446>seek<s%> not <S%H310>after<s%> your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you use to go a <S%H2181>whoring:<s%>
That you may <S%H2142>remember,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to your <S%H430>God.<s%>

I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
